item.title: Shauna add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "A deranged person is supposed to have the strength of ten men. I have the strength of one small boy... with polio." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Shauna add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "It's a match made in heaven...by a retarded angel." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Shauna add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "I did never know so full a voice issue from so empty a heart: but the saying is true 'The empty vessel makes the greatest sound'." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shauna add a quote by Ernie Kovacs
item.description: "Television â€“ a medium. So called because it is neither rare nor well done." -- Ernie Kovacs

item.title: Shauna add a quote by Tony Blair
item.description: "The art of leadership is saying no, not yes. It is very easy to say yes." -- Tony Blair

item.title: Shauna add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Shauna add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no rule on how to write. Sometimes it comes easily and perfectly; sometimes it's like drilling rock and then blasting it out with charges." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Shauna add a quote by P.J. O'Rourke
item.description: "America wasn't founded so that we could all be better. America was founded so we could all be anything we damned well pleased." -- P.J. O'Rourke

item.title: Shauna add a quote by P.J. O'Rourke
item.description: "I like to think of my behavior in the sixties as a "learning experience." Then again, I like to think of anything stupid I've done as a "learning experience." It makes me feel less stupid." -- P.J. O'Rourke
